title.value: Этиологическая структура бактериальной микрофлоры в возникновении респираторных заболеваний телят
Etiological structure of bacterial microflora in contraction of respiratory diseases of calves
Etiological structure of bacterial microflora in contraction of respiratory diseases of calves

journal.title: Epizootiology, Immunobiology, Pharmacology, Sanitary Science : international scientific and practical journal

person.name: Sanzharovskaya, Y.V., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: The specific structure and pathogenic properties of the allocated microorganisms from sick and falling from respiratory diseases calves are investigated.  The analysis of structure of bacterial microflora is carried out and their estimation etiologic structures are given.
